products.name: RULE PRE-WORKOUT
products.infoParagraph: Step into the realm of RULE PRE, where energy and focus unite to up your training sessions. Our carefully formulated blend empowers you with an unrivaled energy, enhancing your performance to new heights.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Pre Energy Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Begin with 1/2 (Half) Scoop of Rule Pre-Workout mixed with 8-10oz of water to assess tolerance. For those accustomed to high stimulants, cautiously increase to 1 LEVEL Scoop before training. Do not surpass 1 serving within 24 hours.

factTitles.title: OTHER INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Natural and Artificial Flavors, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Sucralose, Silicon Dioxide, Calcium Silicate, Malic Acid, Acesulfame Potassium.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: This product is designed for use by healthy adults aged 18 and above. Each serving (1 scoop) provides 300mg of caffeine. Do not consume if pregnant, nursing, using nitrates for chest pain, or taking medication for erectile dysfunction (PDE-5 inhibitors).

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: RULE POST-WORKOUT
products.infoParagraph: Dive into the world of RULE POST, where recovery takes center stage. Our carefully crafted formula aids in swift muscle repair and rejuvenation, ensuring your body bounces back stronger after every workout.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Post Swift-Repair Blend.

factTitles.title: DIRECTIONS & OTHER NOTES
factTitles.paragraph: Combine 1 scoop of RULE with 8 to 10 fl oz of cold water or your preferred beverage. Consume right after your workout and before going to bed. RULE can also be taken on days when you're not exercising to maintain your Creatine levels. Notable Remark: You can have up to 4 servings of RULE each day. For the initial 5-7 days, go through a loading phase to saturate your cells. Recent research indicates that cycling creatine products isn't necessary and they can be used daily. Take 1 Scoop of RULE: Immediately following intense training or activity, prior to your training session, and on days without training.

factTitles.title: OTHER INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Maltodextrin, Dextrose, Citric Acid, Natural and Artificial Flavors, Silica, Sucralose, and Color Dye.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Made in a facility that processes: eggs. Contains Bioengineered Food Ingredients.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: RULE INTRA-WORKOUT
products.infoParagraph: Immerse yourself in the power of RULE INTRA, where essential amino acids and superior hydration merge for ultimate endurance and performance. Our innovative blend supports your body throughout your training.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Intra Performance Blend.

factTitles.title: DIRECTIONS & OTHER NOTES
factTitles.paragraph: Take one serving of RULE with 6-8 ounces of water or your preferred beverage. Consume it either during or after your workout on training days, or at any time throughout the day to stay well-hydrated. For optimal outcomes, blend two servings of RULE in 10-12 ounces of water

factTitles.title: OTHER INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Citric Acid, Natural and Artificial Flavors, Malic Acid, Silicon Dioxide, Sucralose, Acesulfame Potassium,Maltodextrin.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Contains tree nuts (Coconut). Made using equipment that handles milk, peanuts, wheat, and soy.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: RULE WHEY PROTEIN
products.infoParagraph: Up your protein game with RULE WHEY, a premium whey protein powder. Packed with quality nutrients, it's the ideal choice for fueling your fitness journey and achieving your strength goals.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Whey Strength Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Consume a single daily serving of 30 grams, equivalent to 3/4 of a scoop, by blending it with 250ml of water. This consumption is recommended post-workout on training days, and alternatively, at any point during the day on rest days.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Instant Whey Proteins 86% {Whey Protein Concentrate (Milk) [Emulsifier: Lecithins (Soy)], Whey Protein Isolate (Milk) [Emulsifier: Lecithins (Soy)]}, Flavourings, Taurine 3.3%, Salt 2%, L-Arginine 1.7%, L-Glutamine 1.7%, Colour (Ammonia Caramel), Thickener (Xanthan Gum), L-Leucine 0.3%, Sweeteners (Sucralose, Acesulfame K), Anti-Caking Agent (Silicon Dioxide), Bromelain from Pineapple 0.07% (1200 GDU/g), Papain from Papaya 0.07% (1.5 FIP U/mg).

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Contains milk and soy ingredients. Manufactured in a facility that also processes eggs, wheat, peanuts, and tree nuts.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: RULE HYDROLYZED ISOLATE
products.infoParagraph: Introducing our RULE HYDROLYZED ISOLATE, a cutting-edge protein supplement. With rapid absorption and unmatched purity, it's the pinnacle of protein supplementation, ensuring you get the most out of every scoop.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Hydrolyzed Isolate Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: consume one serving (1 scoop) of RULE ISO, which provides 25 grams of protein, either after your workout on training days or at any time during the day on rest days. Mix the serving with 250ml of water for optimal absorption.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Isolate, Cocoa Powder (Processed with Alkali), Natural and Artificial Flavors, Less Than 1% Of: Salt, Soy Lecithin, Sucralose.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Contains milk and soy ingredients. Store in a cool, dry place. Contains Bioengineered food ingredient. keep out of reach of Children.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.
